statements: DELETE FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE building_id = 100 AND waste_type = 'Recyclable'
DELETE FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE compliance_status = FALSE AND disposal_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE waste_type = 'Paper' AND disposal_method = 'Recycling';
DELETE FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE building_id = 100 AND disposal_method = 'Incineration';
DELETE FROM WasteDisposalData WHERE disposal_method = 'landfill' AND quantity > 1000;
DELETE FROM WasteDisposalData WHERE quantity < 100 AND disposal_method = 'landfill';
DELETE FROM BuildingDetails WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY';
DELETE FROM waste_logs WHERE driver_id = 123 AND disposal_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM building WHERE building_name = 'Warehouse A';
